channel.title: Java on jherrlin
channel.description: Recent content in Java on jherrlin

item.title: Learn RxJava with Emacs Org mode
item.description: Intro RxJava is a Java library that can be used to create non blocking reactive systems in Java. The mindset of non blocking and how to work with RxJava was a bit hard for me to grasp, and still is! I am by no means a skilled RxJava user. But I have found a tool that helps me on the journey to become a better one. And of course this is Org mode and Emacs.
